      • createLinkMap

        public static BuildRule createLinkMap(BuildTarget target,
                                      ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem,
                                      SourcePathRuleFinder ruleFinder,
                                      CxxLinkAndCompileRules cxxLinkAndCompileRules)
        Returns:
        a BuildRule that produces a single file that contains linker map produced during the linking process.
        Throws:
        HumanReadableException - if the linked does not support linker maps.
